title: BEAUTIFUL 1 Bed/1 Bath Apartment
posting_body: ['NO UTILITIES INCLUDED', 'Pets allowed case by case', 'Broker fee applies', "The Residences at 1127 Flatbush Avenue sit conveniently at the intersection of two of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods--Prospect Lefferts Gardens and Ditmas Park.", 'Life at 1127 Flatbush is a luxury you can afford.', 'Designed with its residents in mind-360 degree rooftop views of Brooklyn, Manhattan and Queens are only an elevator ride away from your green communal courtyard, laundry room, on-site storage lockers, and fully secure bike room.', 'Each apartment is s thoughtfully considered balance of space and light.', 'Studio, one, and two bedroom layouts all apportioned with in-unit climate control, dishwashers, and stainless steel appliances.', 'Many units also provide private outdoor space overlooking your neighborhood.', 'Lifestyle', '1127 Flatbush provides an authentic Brooklyn experience, sitting at a cultural crossroads representative of its borough.', "A short distance from Brooklyn's Prospect Park, the King's Theater and Ditmas' Park's restaurant, shopping and nightlife-fueled Cortelyou Road, residents at 1127 Flatbush will enjoy not having to go far from home to experience the best of Brooklyn."]
